title: Email Graphic Designer (DTC Physical Brands)
description:
Job Summary

The
 graphic designer will be responsible for the graphic design and build-out of
 marketing for clients. As an
 graphic designer, you will be responsible for designing the
s, presenting designs, making revisions, and creating the
s in Klaviyo.



Note: Applications without a link to
 designs for physical brands will NOT be reviewed.



This Role Is Perfect for You If…

You love working as a team.

You are a self-starter.

You can work under pressure

You have exceptional communication skills

You are results/outcome-driven.

You have a ‘can-do’ attitude. If “that’s not my job” isn’t in your vocabulary, you’ll fit in great!



This Role is NOT the Right Fit For You If You Are…

A ‘me first’ type of person

Not a self-starter.

Not a ‘people person’

Problem-driven, not solution oriented. If you complain about problems/issues/bottlenecks, without proposing a solution, this is not for you.

Looking for a typical 9-5. If you hate Mondays, this is not for you. We’re a mission-driven company who are all about changing the lives and businesses that we work with. If we have something that needs to get done, we’ll have all hands on deck. Sometimes you might have to work late but sometimes you’ll get the afternoon off, it’s not all work no play, but we’re here to help business grow!



Duties

Design new
 pop-ups for clients

Coordinate with
 strategist to develop new
 templates for flows and campaigns

Analyze what creatives have worked the best in the past for pop-ups,
 flows, and
 campaigns

Help to guide creative direction with clients

Work with
 strategist to increase CTRs and increase overall revenue for clients

Strategize with
 strategist to improve
 marketing performance

Help to guide clients on new creative requirements and ideas

Help guide new creative strategies and tests

Help to establish a standard set of KPIs

Optimize
s for both mobile AND desktop

Adhere to
 marketing + design best practices

Build out
s on Klaviyo



Requirements

Minimum of 3 years of experience in a similar role

Minimum of 2 years of experience working with e-commerce brands

Deep understanding of Klaviyo

Experience with adherence to brand standards

Experience with design software like Photoshop, Figma, and In Design

Approach each day with a sense of urgency and purpose

Experience with project management software like ClickUp

Excellent attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to prioritize workload

Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)



Perks

Flexible working hours

Remote working

Room to grow - we're an early stage start-up with a proven track record

Competitive compensation



If you read this and it sounds like the perfect position for you, add your favourite movie at the beginning of your application.



About Us

At Escend Media, we help D2C brands implement retention strategies that increase profit and drive customer retention. We want to be the ‘who’ behind
s that people ask ‘dannngg, who designed that’.

We help 7 and 8 figure ecommerce businesses develop, optimize and scale their owned media marketing efforts. Whether they are just looking to start
 marketing, they need to really refine what they are currently doing or they need someone to take
 marketing off their shoulders, we’re here to help them so that they can focus on running the business.

Our clients are leaders in their industry and have built strong relationships with the customers they serve. Our job is to ensure that their brand image stays consistent online and offline and, more importantly, that their business is growing.



Our company culture practices:

No one is bigger than the team.

We don’t make excuses, we take responsibility.

Innovate everywhere.

Communicate. Communicate. Communicate. We have a culture of open communication.

title: Customer-Focused & Financial Admin Specialist
description:
Schedule: Day Shift | 8 hours/day 



Rate: P50,000 - P55,000 month 



Please read through the whole post



We are an established electrical services provider with over 12 years of experience managing a diverse portfolio of large-scale projects and essential maintenance work. We are seeking a Customer-Focused & Financial Admin VA to serve as the "engine room" of the business.



In this pivotal role, you will act as the primary point of contact for inquiries and take ownership of back-office operations. Your mission is to transition the business from manual coordination to a streamlined, tech-driven operation, allowing the leadership team to focus on high-level growth.



Tasks and Responsibilities



- Communication & Job Management: Manage all inquiries via phone and SMS (Podium). You will be responsible for accurate job entry into Simpro, proactively extracting job scopes from clients, and following up on completed works to ensure 5-star satisfaction.

- Financial & Payroll Support: Assist with bank reconciliations, bill management, and invoicing. You will also manage Accounts Receivable and process staff timesheets, including tracking hours for quarterly compliance reporting.

- Trades & Supplier Liaison: Act as the bridge between the office and the field by chasing tradespeople for missing job data and contacting suppliers to resolve missing Purchase Orders (POs).

- Process Documentation (SOPs): Participate in daily clarity sessions to translate verbal workflows into written Standard Operating Procedures, ensuring the business's knowledge is documented and scalable.

- Digital Transformation: Lead the shift from paper-based systems to digital solutions by creating and managing electronic Jotforms for field use.



 





Tech Stack



- Simpro: Primary job management and project tracking.

- Xero: Financial management, bookkeeping, and payroll.

title: FUNNEL BUILDER (Part-time)
description:
We’re hiring a Funnel Builder who knows how to architect, build, and optimize conversion-focused funnels using GoHighLevel and automation tools like 
 and Zapier.



This role is for someone who thinks in systems, understands how cold traffic behaves, and builds funnels cleanly and correctly. You are here to design, deploy, and improve funnels.  Your priorities are CRO, reliable automation, and creating a magical client experience from the first time someone interacts with our brand.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Team Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important, and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just managing marketing campaigns for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you think like a funnel and conversion architect? Do you enjoy structuring systems, workflows, and sales psychology that drives measurable results? Are you obsessed with improving KPIs by designing experiments and running tests? Do you take pride in building things properly the first time while still iterating and optimizing?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Funnel Architecture, Buildout & Optimization

- Build complete funnels inside GoHighLevel focused on lead generation

- Structure landing pages with conversion principles in mind

- Create and customize pages, forms, and
s

- Embed forms, manage page layouts, and ensure clean user flow across multiple devices

- Maintain proper tagging architecture and funnel logic



Automations, Workflows & Integrations

- Build and maintain workflows, automations, and multi-step sequences

- Implement conditional logic and clean tag-based systems

- Create 
 automations as needed

- Integrate APIs and third-party tools where required (OPTIONAL, but preferred)

- Set up UTM parameters, tracking codes, and verify traffic source links are set up correctly



Tracking, Optimization & Testing

- Implement Meta Pixel, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Manager (bonus)

- Ensure accurate tracking and data flow across funnels

- Apply an A/B testing mindset to improve conversion rates

- Optimize funnels over time based on performance data and KPIs



Campaign Systems & Deployment

- Maintain clean, scalable campaign structures

- Collaborate with leadership on funnel improvements and testing plans

- Continuously learn and stay up to date on best practices to help brainstorm and make recommendations for improvements to our funnel ecosystem



Requirements:

- STRONG hands-on experience with GoHighLevel, required

- Recent experience with workflows, automations, tags, and sequences, required

- Experience building lead generation funnels (not ecom or dropshipping focused), required

- Experience with 
 and/or Zapier automations, required

- Understanding of conversion rate optimization and buyer behavior, required

- Ability to think in systems and campaign logic, required

- Clean build habits, required

- Moderate familiarity with cold traffic funnels, required

- Strong English communication skills; near-native preferred if involved in testing copy

- Interest in copy, funnel strategy, and optimization (execution-focused)

- A stable, high-speed internet connection, required (at least 150mbps)

- Growth mindset, required



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)

- Meta Ads, Google Ads, or media buying familiarity

- Meta Pixel, GA4, GTM setup experience

- Basic SEO understanding

- API integrations beyond native tools



NOTE: This is a part-time role (5–15 hrs/week) with the opportunity to grow into a full-time position for the right person.



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.



As part of your application, include a Loom or YouTube video (2 minutes or less) explaining why you believe you’re a strong fit for this specific Funnel Builder role.







STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to an interview.



STEP 3:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 4:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Funnel Builder with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: Video Editor for Direct Response Ads (Full-Time, $1,500/month)
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce brand looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in direct response ad creatives for
 and Instagram. If you know how to craft scroll-stopping hooks and engaging short-form ads that convert, we want to work with you.



Compensation

- $1,500 USD/month (full-time)

- Paid via Wise or Paypal (whichever you prefer)

- Long-term, stable position with growth opportunities



Responsibilities

- Create 10-15 high-quality video ads per week (length of ads is considered in weekly work)

- Deliver multiple hook variations per video for A/B testing

- Ads will primarily be 10–60 seconds long (occasional testing of longer-form ads)

- Rework existing winning ads into new variations while keeping the core message intact

- Maintain brand consistency while prioritizing performance-driven edits



What We’re Looking For

- Proven experience editing ads for
 & Instagram

- Ability to work with existing content while being able to source necessary content

- Strong understanding of direct response marketing

- Ability to create thumb-stopping hooks that maximize watch time and CTR

- Familiarity with e-commerce advertising and consumer psychology

- Organized, reliable, and able to meet deadlines consistently

- Access to AI Tools for voiceover generation



Hiring Process

- We will select 5 editors for a paid test project.

- Each editor will receive a winning ad file to remake.

- Keep the original audio intact.

- Deliver your best-performing creative version.



Compensation for test project:

- $25 upfront before submission

- $25 after submission

Total: $50 for the test ad



Successful editors will be offered the full-time position at $1,500/month.



How to Apply



Please include the following in your application:

- Your portfolio (links to past ad creatives, especially for
/Instagram)

- A quick note on your experience with direct response ads

- Your favorite type of ad style to edit and why

- Start your application with the word "POSTURE" so we know you read the whole post!

title: CEO's Executive Assistant
description:
About the Role:



This Executive Assistant role supports the CEO directly in a fast-paced, high-stakes environment. Priorities can shift multiple times in a week, and you’ll often need to make decisions independently while keeping multiple projects aligned.





Who this is for:



The EA who succeeds is confident, proactive, and adaptable. You’ll need to anticipate needs, manage competing priorities, and communicate clearly under pressure. While the role is demanding, it’s incredibly rewarding in terms of learning, impact, and exposure to executive-level decision-making.





What You’ll Be Doing:



1. Keeping the CEO’s calendar, meetings, and priorities organized, and catching conflicts before they happen.

2. Acting as the CEO’s right hand: making sure messages, updates, and follow-ups happen smoothly across teams.

3. Drafting and reviewing
s, presentations, and reports so they’re clear and professional.

4. Taking ownership of high-priority projects from start to finish, often with little direction.

5. Tracking deadlines and progress on multiple projects, flagging any potential problems early.

6. Doing research, summarizing info, and presenting solutions that make the CEO’s life easier.

7. Being the point person for internal and external partners, always professional and discreet.

8. Adapting quickly when priorities shift or last-minute requests come in—staying calm is key.

9. Finding ways to improve processes and workflows so things run more smoothly.





Must-Have:



> Proven experience supporting a senior executive, ideally a CEO or high-level leader.

> Superb organizational skills—you can juggle multiple priorities without dropping the ball.

> Excellent communication—clear, concise, and confident in both speaking and writing.

> Strong problem-solving skills—you can make decisions and figure things out independently.

> Emotional intelligence and resilience—you stay composed even when things get hectic or tricky.

> Discretion—you know how to handle sensitive info carefully.

> Tech-savvy with calendars, communication tools, and docs.





Nice-to-Have:



i. Experience in strategic projects or operations.

ii. Comfortable collaborating across multiple teams in a fast-paced environment.

iii. Ability to anticipate needs and solve problems before they become issues.





Why You’ll Love This Role:



If you like fast-paced work, making an impact, and being in the center of everything, this is a place where you can shine. You’ll learn a ton, grow quickly, and work closely with the CEO to help the company run like a well-oiled machine.





How to Apply:



Use “I am Ready” as your subject line and tell us why you’d love this role.

description:

At SIIL Ostomy (Dubai-based, 
/en/), we're the global leader in innovative, empowering clothing and supplies for ostomates. Every day, our products help thousands regain confidence, joy, and freedom after surgery—restoring normal life with comfort and discretion. 



We're exploding in growth internationally, and we're looking for one sharp, detail-obsessed professional to join us closely as our go-to operations brain.

You'll work directly with management, forecasting demand, controlling stocks across manufacturing-to-warehouse flows, optimizing logistics, handling finances, and shaping scalable systems as we expand worldwide.



Long-term opportunity: grow with us, build the team, and import fresh tools/knowledge (we use our custom system now, but we're open—bring your expertise in modern finance/logistics platforms to level us up).

Fully remote (Philippines or India preferred), aligned to Dubai hours (9 AM–5 PM GMT+4).

Excellent English + laser attention to detail.

What You Get:

If you're a professional who wants impact, ownership, and to build alongside a passionate team, this is for you. Apply now: Send resume + short note on your strongest finance/logistics skill and why ostomy empowerment excites you to

title: Junior Business Analyst (Paid Internship ? Business Analyst I Promotion Track)
description:
Company: Quantum Arcadia Group

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Employment Type: Full-Time

Salary: ?10,000–?15,000/month (Probation) | ?25,000–?40,000/month upon Promotion



About Quantum Arcadia Group



Quantum Arcadia Group is a Private Equity & Geopolitics Firm operating across Europe, Asia, North America, and Oceania (Australia).



The firm is structured into seven specialized teams, each composed of 8–14 professionals operating under strict performance, accountability, and execution standards.



You are applying to join the firm’s newest team.



This team is led by our Principal Strategist who holds full operational authority, including unilateral discretion to hire, discipline, or terminate personnel at any time based on performance, conduct, or business necessity.



Role Overview



We are hiring Junior Business Analysts, structured initially as a Paid Intern / Junior BA role for 3–6 months, with strong intention to promote qualified individuals to Business Analyst I thereafter.



This role is designed for serious, high-potential graduates seeking structured professional growth in a disciplined environment.



Compensation & Benefits



During 90-Day Probation:



?10,000–?15,000 monthly



Bi-weekly salary payments



Performance-based bonus eligibility



Upon Promotion to Business Analyst I:



?25,000–?40,000 monthly (based on performance and contribution)



Salary + performance-based bonuses



Paid holidays



Birthday leave (double pay)



Fully remote



Standard working hours



Compensation within the firm is performance-driven. Employees who demonstrate exceptional reliability, execution, and value creation may see compensation increases ranging from approximately 30% to as much as 150%, based solely on merit and business impact. Compensation growth is earned — never guaranteed.



Probation & Standards



All new hires are subject to an immediate 90-day probationary period.



During probation:



Flawless adherence to expectations is required



Any tardiness, unapproved absence, call-outs, or no-shows may result in immediate termination without notice



Performance is continuously evaluated



This is a professional, high-accountability environment. Reliability and discipline are non-negotiable.



Security & Information Access



Certain areas of the firm are intentionally restricted for operational and security reasons. Access to systems, departments, or information is granted strictly on a need-to-know basis.



Lack of visibility should not be interpreted as an error. It is standard operating procedure.



Qualifications



Business-related academic background (Management, Economics, Finance, Political Science, Business Administration, etc.)



Recent graduate or graduating soon with immediate availability



Strong analytical thinking and structured problem-solving ability



High discipline, reliability, and attention to detail



Comfortable in high-pressure environments



Professional communication skills (written and verbal)



Long-term career-oriented mindset



What We Are Building



We are building a disciplined, professional, high-performance team with:



Clear growth pathways



Defined standards



Accountability



Merit-based advancement



This is an opportunity for individuals who want structure, standards, and accelerated growth — not comfort.

description:
About Us

We are a commercial services company based in the U.S. working with property managers, facility managers, and commercial buildings. We’re looking for a skilled LinkedIn Ads Specialist to help us generate qualified B2B leads (not just clicks or followers).

This is a remote position and we are open to hiring talent from the Philippines.



Your Goal

Responsibilities

- Research and build B2B audiences (job titles, industries, company size, locations)

- Write or help improve ad copy and offers

- Optimize campaigns for:

  Cost per lead (CPL)

  Lead quality

  Conversion rate

- Monitor and improve performance weekly

- Provide simple performance reports focused on results

- Test new creatives, audiences, and offers



Requirements

- Proven experience with LinkedIn Ads (B2B lead generation)

- Experience targeting:

- Property Managers

- Facility Managers

- Operations / Decision Makers

- Can show examples or case studies of past results

- Understands B2B marketing and lead generation

- Speaks and writes good English

- Organized, reliable, and results-focused



Not a Fit If You…

- Only do organic social media posting

- Focus on likes, followers, or branding only

- Don’t have experience with paid LinkedIn Ads

- Can’t explain how you measure lead quality and ROI



Job Type

- Remote

Pay

Open to:

Hourly rate or monthly retainer

Please include your expected rate in your application.



Bonus (Not Required)

- Experience with B2B services, real estate, facilities, or commercial businesses

Application Instructions:

Change the subject line of your application to: “I am the right specialist for LinkedIn”

title: Performance Marketing Specialist – Lead Generation & Website Conversions
description:
We are hiring a Paid Ads Expert to join our marketing agency. This role is focused entirely on performance. Your job is to generate qualified leads and website purchases across multiple client accounts.



This is not a brand awareness or engagement role. We are looking for someone who understands funnels, tracking, attribution, and ROI.



Your Mission:

Plan, launch, optimize, and scale paid advertising campaigns that produce measurable business results for multiple clients at the same time.



Responsibilities:



1. Develop full-funnel paid ad strategies for e-commerce and B2B clients.



2. Plan and manage campaigns on Meta Ads 
 and Instagram) and Google Ads. TikTok Ads experience is a plus.



3. Build conversion-focused campaigns optimized for website purchases and lead form submissions.



4. Structure cold, warm, and retargeting campaigns properly.



5. Set up and manage tracking systems including Meta Pixel, Google Tag Manager, GA4, and conversion events.



6. Implement proper attribution using UTMs and event tracking.



7. Conduct A/B testing on creatives, audiences, offers, and landing pages.



8. Monitor and optimize key metrics such as cost per lead, cost per acquisition, ROAS, and conversion rates.



9. Provide weekly performance reports with data insights and action plans.



10. Collaborate with designers, video editors, and account managers to align creatives with campaign objectives.



11. Handle multiple client accounts simultaneously while maintaining performance standards.



Requirements:



1. Proven experience running conversion-focused paid campaigns for e-commerce and B2B lead generation.



2. Ability to show real results with clear metrics such as CPL, CPA, and ROAS.



3. Strong understanding of audience targeting, funnel structure, and retargeting strategies.



4. Hands-on experience setting up tracking and analytics correctly.



5. Data-driven decision making and structured optimization approach.



6. Ability to manage time and performance across multiple active campaigns.



7. Clear communication and reporting skills.



What Success Looks Like:



1. Consistent generation of qualified leads at target CPL.



2. Profitable website purchases at sustainable CPA.



3. Clear performance reporting and proactive optimization.



4. Ability to manage multiple client campaigns without performance decline.



Compensation:

Open to full-time monthly retainer. Please include your rate structure and availability.



To Apply:



1. Send 2 to 3 case studies showing campaign structure and results.



2. Briefly explain how you would structure a paid campaign to generate 50 qualified leads in 14 days.



3. Include the subject line: "Performance Growth Operator"



We are looking for someone who measures success in revenue and leads, not impressions.

title: Inbound Sales Development Representative (Live Transfers – Social Media Leads – Full Time)
description:

You will be responsible for calling inbound leads immediately, qualifying them, and live transferring qualified prospects to our closer.



We use GoHighLevel CRM and structured follow-up systems.



If you are competitive, disciplined, and understand dialing metrics, this role is for you.



???? Responsibilities



• Call new inbound leads within 5 minutes of submission

• Execute structured 5-day follow-up cadence (calls + SMS)

• Qualify prospects using script and criteria

• Live transfer qualified leads to closer

• Log activity properly inside GoHighLevel

• Maintain clean pipeline and dispositions

• Track and report daily metrics



???? Performance Expectations



• Fast speed-to-lead

• 20–35% connect rate (as volume grows)

• Consistent live transfers

• Dials per day

? Requirements

• Experience using dialers

• CRM experience (GoHighLevel or HubSpot preferred)

• Strong spoken English

???? Compensation

Bonus per qualified live transfer



Monthly performance bonuses



Long-term opportunity with growth inside the company.



???? To Apply

How many calls per day did you average in your last role?

What CRM and dialer have you used?

Applications without answers will not be considered.

title: Social Media Manager + Digital Designer + Content Creator + Paid Ads Specialist (Meta + TikTok | Luxury Brand)
description:
Contractor Retainer | Weekly Pay | Long-Term Commitment REQUIRED



McGee Entertainment is a premium live entertainment company delivering luxury weddings and events across Australia — and we’re expanding into new markets.



We’re looking for a true all-rounder (“unicorn”) who can own social media management, digital design, content creation, short-form video editing, asset creation, blog publishing, and paid ads management across Meta + TikTok.



You’re equal parts creative and performance-minded: your work looks premium and drives enquiries.







**Contractor Retainer + Pay (Weekly)**



Hours: approx. 10 hours per week (40 hours per month retainer)

Rate: $9 USD/hour

Monthly retainer: $360 USD (40 
 paid weekly via EasyPay ($83/week)

Timesheets: Clockify (time tracking + reporting)

Payment method: EasyPay (OnlineJobs.ph)

Overtime: paid at $9/hr for approved additional hours

Hours are flexible/asynchronous, as long as deadlines and priorities are met

Long-term commitment is a MUST (please only apply if you want to stay long-term)







**What You’ll Own (Ongoing Support)**



1) Social Media Management

Help manage our channels (primarily Instagram + TikTok; others as required)

Maintain a consistent posting rhythm and brand voice

Turn raw footage and updates into polished, ready-to-post content

Keep content organised and easy for our team to review/approve



2) Digital Design + Asset Creation (Luxury Aesthetic)

Create premium assets as needed: posts, carousels, stories, promos, testimonials, package spotlights

Maintain a modern luxury look (clean layouts, strong typography, tasteful design)

Work from brand references and keep everything visually cohesive



3) Short-Form Video Editing (Reels + TikTok)

Edit vertical video content from real performance footage (music/events)

Strong hooks, pacing, captions, and clean modern cuts

Bonus if you can edit to music/performance 
nts (timing matters)



4) Paid Ads Management (Meta + TikTok) — MUST HAVE PROVEN RESULTS

Build, launch, manage and optimise campaigns (not “boosting posts”)

Develop and test creative angles, hooks, formats, and iterations

Understand how to drive enquiries/leads for a premium service brand

Provide weekly performance notes: what’s working, what’s not, what we test next



5) TikTok Setup + TikTok Ads (Immediate Priority)

Set up TikTok properly (profile, content pillars, posting rhythm)

Bring a Gen Z approach to hooks, trends, pacing and native-style creatives (while keeping a luxury finish)

Launch and optimise TikTok ads from the beginning



6) Blog Publishing + Squarespace (Must Have)

Publish blog posts and update content on our Squarespace website as required

Confident with Squarespace updates (swap imagery, add sections, embed video, basic edits)

Keep pages looking premium and on-brand



7) Bonus Tools (Ideal)

Experience with Madgicx (often misheard as “MagicX”) or similar ad tools is ideal







**What We’re Looking For**



You must have:

-A strong portfolio showing luxury-level design + short-form video

-Proven Meta ads results (must show evidence)

-Proven TikTok ads results (must show evidence)

-High attention to detail (spelling, formatting, brand consistency)

-Clear communication and reliability

-Ability to work independently and take ownership

-Long-term commitment is a MUST

-Advantageous: experience with music, events, weddings, hospitality, or performance-based content.







**Hiring Timeline (IMPORTANT)**



-Job ad open: Friday 13 February to Thursday 19 February

-Shortlisted candidates contacted: Friday 20 February

-Interviews: 30-minute Zoom interview on Monday 23 February or Tuesday 24 February

-Candidate selected: Wednesday 25 February







**To Apply (Please Include All)**



-Your timezone + typical availability

-Portfolio links (design + short-form video examples)

-Meta ads proof/results (screenshots or a short case study)

-TikTok ads proof/results (screenshots or a short case study)

-Confirm you can commit to ~10 hours per week / 40 hours per month ongoing and that you’re seeking a long-term contractor role



Answer these:

Q1: What makes content feel “luxury” (not cheap or templated)?

Q2: Share 5 content ideas you’d create first for a premium entertainment brand

Q3: What’s your process for testing ads creative and finding winners?



**Applications without portfolio links and Meta/TikTok ads proof will not be considered.**

title: Executive Assistant (Operations) for Experienced Online Creator
description:
Are you a smart, reliable, and extremely detail-oriented VA who loves keeping things organized in Clickup? And do you have experience helping online creators with courses and funnels?




 (BHWA) is a well-established aging health and caregiving education website created by me, Dr. Leslie Kernisan, MD. I’m a geriatrician and blogger growing an online membership for people helping aging parents. I also have two YouTube channels and a podcast.



I’m now hiring for a smart and very detail-oriented executive virtual assistant who will be helping me execute, document, coordinate, and problem-solve in all areas of my business.



The role will start at about 20 hours per week, with potential to grow in hours (and in hourly rate!), if you are able to do the job well and take more off my plate. When you get the work done is flexible, but you’ll need to do at least a few hours every weekday.



Please note that I have been running BHWA for 10+ years, I’ve had the same Ph-based VA doing routine tasks and customer service since 2020, and I do have ongoing freelancers to help with things like video editing and complex automations. Although I am always learning and growing, at this point I know my business very well, and I know what works well for me when it comes to VAs.



This role is NOT for someone who just wants to be handed tasks to do. For this executive VA role, I need to find someone very much like me: smart, organized, proactive, and EXTREMELY detail-oriented. Someone who will double-check that things are done correctly (e.g. the links in an
 broadcast), so that I don’t have to. Someone who can figure out why something isn’t working and fix it, so that I don’t have to.



You will also need to be willing and able to document everything you do as you go along; I have found this is critical to running the business long-term. (So if you are the type who likes to go fixing problems but skips documenting what you changed and why, you are not a good fit.)



You must have previous experience with Clickup and Wordpress. Experience with ActiveCampaign, Kajabi, and YouTube is strongly preferred.



You will need to be excellent at following instructions and also resourceful enough to figure things out and solve problems when necessary. During your training phase, you will need to be checking with me often; once we have gotten to know each other and you’ve demonstrated that you can do the work according to my standards, I will be happy to give you more autonomy.



This will be a great steady job for the right person! If you think you are a good fit, please apply.



JOB TITLE

Virtual Executive Assistant

Executive Assistant & Operations Assistant



JOB DETAILS



Compensation

- $8-10/hour (negotiable depending on skills and experience), with the possibility of raising the rate once you have learned the business and are freeing up my time

- Paid every two weeks (or monthly) via Wise



Work hours:

- 3-4 hours every week day, up to 20 hours/week as a start. More may be occasionally needed. Weekly hours can be increased if you are able to take on additional responsibilities.

- My working hours are usually between 9am to 4pm Pacific Time. You do not need to do all your work within this window, but should be available for meetings if requested.

- The company tracks work hours using Hubstaff



Knowledge and experience requirement:

- Experience in task and project coordination using ClickUp

- Experience with online optin forms, basic automations and funnels

- At least one year experience of working-from-home as a virtual assistant, preferably as Executive Assistant

- Excellent problem-solving skills, resilient and determined to find or create solutions.

- A proven work ethic and the ability to anticipate needs, initiate decisions and coordinate the activities of others.

- Experience with data reporting and Excel spreadsheets

- Experience working with our current tech stack is strongly preferred: for BHWA these include Wordpress, ActiveCampaign, Kajabi, OptinMonster, Google analytics, Zapier, YouTube.



Scope of support:

Administrative and operations support to Dr. Leslie Kernisan, founder and principal of Better Health While Aging. Duties may include (but are not limited to):

- Attend, participate and take notes for weekly planning meetings

- Assist Dr. K with documentation of her work and with execution of her various tasks

- Project coordination using Clickup; monitor and communicate project status, ensure that it’s updated and next steps are clear for everyone

- Compile and present status reports

- Monitoring and reporting on key performance indicators

- Contribute to improving our process for handling member registrations, cancellations, and other customer support issues

- Assisting with the creation and organization of registration pages and other logistics, when we run our membership enrollment drives

- Assisting with the Company’s website and related
 subscriber list



HOW TO APPLY

To apply, you must do the following things:

- Make sure your profile in Onlinejobs.ph includes IQ and DISC assessment

- Include the words AGING IS IMPORTANT in the subject line of your message to me

- Send me a cover letter explaining why this position appeals to you and why you think you are an excellent fit



Only candidates who complete all the above will receive responses. Thank you for your interest, I appreciate it!

title: Executive Assistant
description:
Read This Before Applying

This is not a basic virtual assistant role.



If you are looking for simple task lists, calendar management, or repetitive admin work — this is not a fit.



This role exists to create leverage for a fast-moving CEO and COO at a growing U.S.-based marketing agency.



You will operate in a high-context, high-standards environment with frequent switching between hiring, writing, coordination, analytics, and execution.



If you thrive in ambiguity, think in systems, and use AI as a force multiplier — keep reading.



The Mission

Own the flow of information from raw input ? structured system ? finished output so leadership is no longer the bottleneck.

You will turn voice notes, Loom recordings, transcripts, and messy ideas into:

- Clean documents

- Structured hiring pipelines

- Organized dashboards

- Polished communication

- Reliable execution systems



If this role is done well, leadership feels:

- Fewer dropped balls

- Fewer repeated explanations

- Less mental clutter

- Cleaner systems

- Higher quality written output

If that does not happen, the role is not being executed correctly.



Core Areas of Ownership



1. Hiring Pipeline Execution

This is one of the highest-leverage areas.

- You will turn transcripts into:

-- Job descriptions

-- Scorecards

-- Interview questions

-- Must-have vs. nice-to-have lists

- Post jobs

- Track applicants

- Schedule interviews

- Send follow-ups

- Draft offer
s (approved before sending)

- Prepare offer letters from templates

- Coordinate references

- Manage onboarding logistics



You must be comfortable extracting structure fro
ssy conversations using AI tools.



2. “You Speak, They Build” Operations

The Founder communicates in:

- Loom videos

- Slack voice notes

- Call transcripts

- Bullet points



You turn them into:

- SOPs

- Checklists

- Notion docs

- Decision memos

- Organized execution plans

You are responsible for clarity.



3. COO Support & Internal Coordination

You will:

- Maintain executive priority trackers

- Prepare meeting agendas

- Capture notes and action items

- Follow up on commitments

- Build weekly summaries:

-- What moved

-- What’s stuck

-- What needs decision

You must follow up politely but persistently.



4. Travel & Logistics (Business + Personal)

You will own:

- Flights

- Hotels

- Itineraries

- Calendar adjustments

- Expense tracking

- Changes and cancellations

Mistakes here cost real money and time. Accuracy matters.



5. Data Organization & Reporting

You will:

- Clean messy spreadsheets

- Standardize naming conventions

- Structure data so it becomes usable

- Create charts for leadership review

- Maintain simple dashboards in Google Sheets

- Use AI tools to accelerate reporting

- Dashboards must support decisions — not decoration.



6. AI-Enabled Writing & Communication

You will draft:

- Internal announcements

- Client
s

- SOPs

- Hiring documents

- Onboarding materials

- Meeting follow-ups

- Templates



Writing must be:

- Clear

- Direct

- Professional

- No fluff

- Strong written English is mandatory.



Required Skills

You must demonstrate:

- Excellent written English

- Strong organizational ability

- High attention to detail

- Comfort working independently

- Ability to manage multiple workstreams



Proficiency with:

- Google Docs

- Google Sheets

- Calendars

- Slack

- Loom

- ChatGPT / Claude

You must be comfortable using AI daily to increase speed and clarity.



Work Expectations

- Full-time (35 hours/week)

- Minimum 6-hour overlap with US Pacific Time

- Responsive during working hours

- Written updates without prompting

- Issues escalated same day

- Missed deadlines without notice are unacceptable



This Role Is Not For You If:

- You need step-by-step instructions

- You wait to be told what to do

- You dislike writing

- You struggle with ambiguity

- You avoid follow-up

- You prefer repetitive task-only roles



Compensation

- $12,480–$16,640 USD per year

- Paid bi-monthly (1st and 15th)

- Full-time, long-term position

- Annual performance-based raise

- Stable role inside a growing company



What Good Looks Like After 60 Days

Leadership experiences:

- Cleaner systems

- Organized hiring pipelines

- Clear documentation

- Fewer dropped balls

- Less reactive scrambling

- Higher writing quality with less revision

If you are still waiting for instructions after 60 days, this role is not a fit.



Application Instructions (Required)

To be considered, you must include:

- A 3–5 minute Loom video introducing yourself

- Your internet speed (upload & download)

- Confirmation of US PT overlap hours

- A short explanation of how you use AI tools in your daily workflow

Applications missing these will not be reviewed.



What to Expect After Applying

If your application meets the requirements listed above, you will receive a skills assessment within 48 hours. The assessment is a practical exercise based on a real scenario you would encounter in this role. It is designed to take a strong candidate 60–90 minutes. We will evaluate your ability to gather information, organize it clearly, and communicate with a team — not whether you used AI to help. Candidates who score well on the assessment will be invited to a live interview. We respect your time and move quickly. 



Final Note

We are not hiring a helper. We are hiring a high-agency Executive Assistant who thinks like an operator and uses AI as leverage. If you want stability, growth, and real ownership — apply.

title: Personal Virtual Assistant for Business Executive
description:
We're looking for a sharp, reliable Virtual Personal Assistant to help a busy entrepreneur stay fully organized across personal life - health and fitness tracking, travel planning, reservations, errands, research, and daily logistics. You need to be fast, responsive, and always a step ahead. Strong research skills, attention to detail, and high integrity are non-negotiable.



This isn't a gig - it's a long-term partnership. I invest in people who invest in me. That means competitive pay now, raises over time, and real stability. The right person will never have to worry about finding another job. You have my back, I have yours.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT DAY TO DAY LOOKS LIKE



- I send you a photo of my lunch — you estimate macros and log it in my tracking sheet within minutes

- I screenshot my body composition scan — you log every measurement and flag any trends

- I tell you "plan a weekend trip to Tulum for me and my girlfriend" — you come back with flights, hotel, restaurant reservations, and a full itinerary without asking me 20 questions

- Track all my subscriptions and flag me before anything renews so I can cancel what I don't need

- Find me the best cold plunge under $5,000 — compare features, dimensions, cooling systems, warranties, and give me a top 3 with pros and cons

- I want to start a new supplement stack for sleep optimization — research the science, find the best brands, figure out timing and dosages, and put it all in a clean doc I can follow

- I mention I have a headache and haven't been sleeping well — you cross-reference my recent meals and macros to flag if something's off nutritionally before I even ask

- I'm comparing two different health protocols I saw online — break down the science behind both, pros and cons, and tell me which one actually makes sense for my goals

- I got bloodwork back — organize the results in a spreadsheet, flag anything out of range, and research what supplements or dietary changes could help

- I'm training for a specific physical goal — research the best approach, recovery protocols, and adjust my nutrition tracking to match



There are plenty more tasks but hopefully that gives you a real picture of what this role looks like.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT I'M LOOKING FOR



- Proven experience as a personal assistant — this is not an entry-level role

- Fast communicator — responsive throughout 9am-9pm EST, 7 days a week

- Proactive and independent — you figure things out and anticipate needs before being asked

- Strong researcher — you dig deep, not just surface-level Googling

- Organized and detail-oriented — nothing falls through the cracks

- Comfortable using AI tools like Claude for research and efficiency (very important) - means your good at prompting

- Interest in health and fitness — you'll be working with nutrition and body composition data daily

- Honest and direct — if you make a mistake, tell me immediately. I'm understanding, I just need to know

- Takes feedback well and always looking to improve

- Trustworthy and discreet



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY YOU'D WANT THIS ROLE



Long-term stability — I don't cycle through assistants. I'm looking for someone to grow with for years, not months

I'm a kind, direct, and reasonable person to work for. I don't micromanage. I give you goals and trust you to figure out the how 



Competitive pay with consistent raises as we build together — your growth is tied to mine



Variety every single day — no two days look the same. You'll never be bored



You'll be genuinely valued, not treated like a task robot. I take care of the people who take care of me



Actual work is roughly 3 hours a day — the rest of the time you're on-call but free. You're being paid for availability and reliability, not busywork



You'll learn a ton — health optimization, travel planning, business operations. This role makes you better at everything

If you're the right person and you bring your best every day, this is the last job you'll ever need to find



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO APPLY

- Start your application with the word "organized" so I know you read this



- Record a 2-3 minute Loom video: who you are, your experience as a personal assistant (who you worked for, what you handled, how long), one specific example of a time you anticipated a need before being asked, and why you're looking for a long-term role



- Send examples of past work — itineraries, spreadsheets, trackers, anything that shows how you organize and deliver

title: Creative Video Editor for Travel & Wine Content + AI video ad training included
description:
I’m looking for a creative video editor to help me turn years of backlogged travel footage future travel footage into engaging Reels, TikToks, and YouTube Shorts.

The Opportunity:

This role starts with two immediate projects (general travel content and wine education/wine travel), but if we work well together, you’ll get access to professional AI video training (valued at $5k) and the opportunity to scale your skills and earnings.

The Projects (Starting February-March):

Project 1: Travel Content - I’ve traveled to dozens of countries and have years of footage I’ve never done anything with. I also have two big trips coming up (Dominican Republic next week  and France and Italy in March). I need someone who can take raw travel footage and make it scroll-stopping.

Project 2: Wine Content - Wine education and wine travel content (combining sommelier-level expertise with travel).

If These Go Well (April Onward):

AI Video Ad Training - You’d join me in learning an 8-week AI video ad creation program (valued at $5k, my discounted rate is $2k). We’d learn together how to create humor-leaning video ads for small businesses using cutting-edge AI tools.

Once you master this system, you’d be welcome to take on your own local clients using what you’ve learned. I’d focus on US clients (at higher rates), which means your pay would grow as we scale together.

What I Need Right Now:

Someone who can look at raw footage and immediately see the story. I don’t want to have to explain every edit - I want someone who understands what makes people stop scrolling and can bring creative ideas to the table.

Specifically:

 ? Strong hooks (the first 3 seconds are everything)

 ? Good pacing and retention (keep people watching)

 ? Clean captions and text overlays

 ? Understanding of what performs on Reels/TikTok/Shorts

 ? Fast turnaround - I’m traveling soon and need content posted while it’s timely, not weeks later

What I’m Looking For:

? Creative eye - Can spot interesting 
nts and turn them into engaging stories? Self-starter - Can work with direction but also bring your own ideas? Growth mindset - Excited to learn new AI tools and build high-value skills? Long-term thinker - This starts with travel content, but the goal is to grow together

To Apply - PLEASE INCLUDE:

???? Portfolio: Links to 2-3 Reels, TikToks, or YouTube Shorts you’ve created (travel/lifestyle content preferred but not required)

???? Tools: What editing software do you use? (CapCut, DaVinci Resolve, Premiere, etc.)

? Availability: How many hours per week can you commit?

? Why you: What excites you about this opportunity specifically?

Applications without portfolio links of some kind (even if it’s your personal Instagram) will not be reviewed.

This isn’t just a VA job - it’s a chance to learn high-value skills and grow your earning potential. If that excites you, I’d love to see your work!

title: SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexi Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflo

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: Ecommerce Growth Manager (Shopify & Klaviyo Expert)
description:
Role Overview

We are a legacy health and nutrition brand (Agape Nutrition) transitioning from a "supplement department store" to a "protocol-based authority." I am seeking a high-level Growth Manager to act as my "external brain" and project lead. You will be responsible for executing a structured roadmap in Smartsheet to move our revenue from $6k/month to our historical high of $40k/month.

Key Responsibilities

Shopify Optimization: Audit our store for mobile speed, remove non-essential apps, and restructure our navigation from "Categories" to "Solution-Based Protocols" (e.g., Gut Integrity, Neural Calm).

Klaviyo Management: Clean and segment a database of 18,000 profiles in Shopify. Build advanced automated flows (Welcome, Browse Abandonment, and Post-Purchase Support).

Data & Operations: Manage our 3000+ SKU inventory and customer lists via Google Sheets/CSV bulk edits.

Project Management: Update and maintain our Smartsheet Master Plan, providing weekly "Pulse Reports" so the Founder stays informed without being overwhelmed.

Requirements

Expert Mastery of Shopify and Klaviyo (Certification preferred).

Experience with Smartsheet or similar high-level project management tools.

Strategic Thinking: Ability to build product "bundles" and "pathways" similar to the Amy Myers or Thorne models.

Self-Starter: You must be able to work independently. I have limited energy for micromanagement; I need you to bring solutions, not just problems.



This is not an advisory position.  This is a I know what I am doing inside and out.  Review the site, use AI to help, and revise this store so it sells. This is not a newby job.  This is job for a Shopify Rockstar.  You will be responsible for turning this store around.  I have AI aided plans to help, but you not me will be doing the work and keeping me in the loop.  You do this well and you will be permently employed with a good salary and better bonuses.  But please it you don't have the skills don't waste your time and mine.  



List previous experience:



Please answer the following three questions in your application:



Our current conversion rate is 0.7%. What are the first 3 things you would check on our Shopify backend to fix this?



How would you handle a "cold" import list of 4,000 names in Klaviyo to avoid being marked as spam?



Are you comfortable using Smartsheet to track your own KPIs and report them to a Founder with limited tim

title: Digital Marketing Manager/Executive of Operations
description:
I am seeking an elite Virtual Assistant to work directly with me in a high-growth digital business. This role is not entry-level, not administrative-only, and not suitable for individuals who require constant direction. This is a high-trust, high-responsibility position for someone who operates with ownership, urgency, and strategic thinking.



This position requires an individual who is exceptionally capable, innovative, execution-driven, and confident communicating on my behalf.



COMPENSATION & GROWTH

• $60,000 PHP per month to start

• Then 90-day performance review & Increase to $88,000 PHP per month if performing well

• Additional Performance-based bonuses on every lead you bring me and I close: PHP 6,000 - PHP 24,000 ADDITIONAL Per Closed Sale (Bonuses begin immediately) ((It is possible to get several bonuses PER DAY)

• Significant long-term earning potential for the right individual



This is a long-term opportunity with income directly tied to results and initiative.



CORE REQUIREMENTS (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

Applicants must meet all of the following:



• Fluent English (spoken and written)

• Ability and willingness to work my time zone hours

• Advanced understanding of Meta 
 & Instagram)

• Strong knowledge of social media algorithms, engagement, restrictions, monetization, and growth strategies

• Comprehensive understanding of short-form video platforms, including:

– YouTube Shorts

– TikTok

– Instagram Reels



• Familiarity with emerging and underutilized platforms, including:

– Threads

– Snapchat

– New or trending social platforms as they emerge

• Ability to identify platform-specific opportunities for visibility, reach, and lead generation



• Basic graphic design skills, including the ability to:

– Create simple, clean graphics for social media

– Work with templates and brand guidelines

– Use tools such as Canva or equivalent

-- Advanced experience making quality Reels



• Willingness and ability to continually improve design skills as needed

• Strong working knowledge of AI tools, including:

– AI for content creation

– AI for research and ideation

– AI for productivity and automation



• Commitment to staying current on AI developments, tools, and best practices as they evolve

• Comfortable making outbound calls to businesses to introduce services, follow up on leads, and support sales efforts

• Confident speaking with business owners and decision-makers

• Willingness to handle light sales conversations and appointment-setting

• Confidence operating inside both business and personal digital accounts

• Highly organized, detail-oriented, and dependable

• Proactive, resourceful, and able to self-educate rapidly

• Comfortable taking initiative without waiting for instruction

• Professional, outgoing, and able to communicate clearly and confidently on my behalf





This role is for someone who thinks beyond standard playbooks, embraces new technology, and consistently looks for innovative ways to generate traction and revenue.



REQUIRED TOOLS & SETUP

Applicants must already have, or be willing to maintain, the following:



• Reliable high-speed internet

• A quiet, professional environment for calls

• Active Zoo
mbership

• Familiarity with (or ability to quickly learn):

– Calendly

– Google Workspace

– Social media scheduling platforms

– Graphic design tools

– AI tools for content and productivity

• Any additional applications required to perform duties efficiently and professionally



Technical readiness is mandatory. You must be equipped to operate seamlessly from day one.



SCOPE OF RESPONSIBILITIES

(INCLUDES BUT IS NOT LIMITED TO)



DIGITAL & SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGEMENT

• Logging into and managing my social media accounts across platforms

• Monitoring comments, DMs, and engagement

• Executing follow-up and lead outreach

• Tracking engagement and identifying growth opportunities

• Staying current with platform updates, restrictions, and algorithm changes

• Supporting monetization efforts and profile optimization

• Researching creators, trends, formats, and platform-specific strategies

• Reviewing analytics and proposing improvements



CONTENT, DESIGN & INNOVATION

• Assisting with content planning and execution across platforms

• Creating basic social media graphics and visual assets

• Supporting brand-aligned content using templates and guidelines

• Identifying viral trends and translating them into actionable content ideas

• Supporting short-form video strategy for Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

• Exploring non-traditional growth channels such as Threads and Snapchat

• Leveraging AI tools to improve speed, creativity, and efficiency

• Bringing new ideas weekly to improve reach, visibility, and lead flow



SALES & OUTREACH SUPPORT

• Making outbound calls to businesses as assigned

• Following up with warm and cold leads

• Supporting appointment-setting and closing workflows

• Maintaining professionalism and brand voice during all outreach

• Tracking outreach activity and results



OPERATIONS & BUSINESS SUPPORT

• Managing Calendly, Zoom, and scheduling systems

• Updating onboarding documents, reports, and workflows

• Supporting funnel creation, research, and revisions

• Assisting with training organization, follow-ups, and systems

• Coordinating communication with collaborators and contractors



PERSONAL ASSISTANT RESPONSIBILITIES

• Handling personal administrative and logistical tasks

• Managing personal scheduling and communications as needed

• Supporting personal follow-ups and time-sensitive matters

• Acting as a trusted extension of me across both business and personal affairs



This role requires discretion, professionalism, and accountability. You will be granted access to sensitive systems and accounts.



EXPECTATIONS

• You will operate with ownership, urgency, and initiative

• You will proactively identify problems and propose solutions

• If you do not know how to do something, you will figure it out and master it

• You will stay current on AI, platforms, and trends

• You will think creatively and bring innovative ideas consistently

• You will attend weekly Zoom check-ins

• You will treat this role as a long-term career opportunity







To be considered, applicants must submit all of the following:



A short video (2–4 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining:

• Your background and experience

• Why you are an exceptional fit for this role

• How you approach learning new skills and solving unfamiliar problems

A list of social media accounts you have managed, including:

• Instagram,
, TikTok, YouTube, or other platforms

• Direct handles or links

• A brief description of your role (content, growth, engagement, ads, etc.)

A written response answering:

• “What do you do when you are given a task you have never done before?”





FINAL NOTE



This position is intended for an individual who wants to grow alongside a business, contribute strategically, and be rewarded for performance. If you are ambitious, innovative, and ready to operate at a high level, this role offers substantial upside.



Only serious, qualified applicants should apply.

title: Short-Form Video Editor — TikTok-Style Meta Ads | $750/month
description:
We're a fast-growing e-commerce brand selling a physical product through Meta ads. We need a short-form video editor who can produce scroll-stopping 7-15 second ads that convert.



This role is NOT for you if:



• Your portfolio is wedding videos or corporate content

• You think "cinematic" = better

• You don't actively watch TikTok

• You need 3 days to edit a 10-second video

This role IS for you if:



• You understand hooks. First 3 seconds = everything.

• You can reverse-engineer a winning ad and recreate the energy

• You edit fast. Quick cuts, punchy pacing, no fluff.

• You're TikTok-native — you know what's trending and why it works

• You can produce 10+ short videos per week without dropping quality

What you'll do:



• Edit 7-15 second vertical video ads for
/Instagram

• Create 2 hook variations per concept

• Match trending TikTok styles to our product

• Reverse-engineer competitor ads and recreate structures

• Turn around edits within 24-48 hours

Requirements:



• CapCut or Premiere Pro proficiency

• Portfolio with SHORT-FORM ad examples (TikTok, Reels, Meta ads)

• Understanding of direct response advertising (ads that sell, not just look good)

• Reliable internet and communication

• Available during US Eastern business hours for feedback

Compensation:



• $750/month starting

• Performance bonuses for winning ads

• Raises based on results

To apply:



1. Send a link to your portfolio (must include short-form ad examples — NOT Google Drive, use YouTube/Vimeo)

2. Pick any trending TikTok ad and tell me in 2-3 sentences why it works

3. Include the word "HOOK" in your message so I know you read this

Applications without a portfolio or the keyword will be ignored.

title: Lead Generation Manager
description:
Lead Generation Manager (LGM)

Company: Serviceflo

Location: Remote

Schedule: Full-Time | U.S. Business Hours

Base Salary: $1000 USD / month

Performance Bonuses: Monthly, uncapped

Start Date: Immediate



About Serviceflo

Serviceflo is a U.S.-based company that builds automation and growth systems for service-based businesses. We work with owners who want cleaner operations, stronger sales systems, and predictable growth — not chaos.

We operate with high standards, clear expectations, and a long-term mindset.

We value people who take ownership, follow process, and care deeply about the quality of their work.

This is not a call center.

This is a professional sales environment.



Why This Role Exists

- The Lead Generation Manager (LGM) is a critical front-line role at Serviceflo.

- Your job is to start high-quality conversations, identify whether a business is a good fit for Serviceflo, and book qualified discovery calls for our senior sales team.

- The quality of your work directly impacts:

- Revenue

- Close rates

- Client experience

- Brand reputation

- We are hiring carefully and intentionally for this role.



Role Overview

As an LGM, you will:

- Conduct outbound calls to U.S.-based service business owners

- Speak clearly, confidently, and professionally in English

- Ask structured questions to assess fit and intent

- Book discovery calls only when qualification standards are met

- Protect the sales calendar from low-quality or unprepared prospects

- This role requires discipline, consistency, and strong communication skills.



Key Responsibilities

- Outbound Outreach

- Make outbound calls daily using company-provided lists and systems

- Follow approved scripts and messaging frameworks

- Represent Serviceflo professionally in every interaction

- Maintain steady daily activity to generate pipeline consistently



Lead Qualification

- Identify whether a prospect fits Serviceflo’s Ideal Customer Profile

- Assess decision-making authority, business size, pain points, and urgency

- Ask clear, professional qualification questions

- Disqualify poor-fit leads quickly and confidently



Discovery Call Booking

- Book discovery calls only when qualification criteria are met

- Clearly explain the purpose and expectations of the discovery call

- Ensure prospects are prepared, informed, and committed to attending

- Reduce no-shows through proper expectation setting



CRM & Documentation

Log all activity accurately in the CRM

- Write clear, detailed call notes for every live conversation

- Capture key insights that help the sales team close effectively

- Maintain clean, reliable data at all times

- Process Adherence & Improvement

- Follow Serviceflo’s sales process without deviation

- Accept feedback and coaching without ego

- Improve performance through repetition and execution

- Participate in training, reviews, and tea
etings as required



Compensation Structure

Base Salary

- $500-$750 USD per month

- Paid reliably and on time

- Intended to provide stability while performance bonuses reward excellence



"Performance Bonuses"

In addition to base salary, LGMs earn monthly performance bonuses, including:

- Bonuses for qualified discovery calls

- Bonuses for closed deals

- Bonus amounts are determined by:

- Lead quality

- Accuracy of qualification

- Overall contribution to revenue

- Top performers earn significantly more than base pay (Some near $1750-$2200)



What We’re Looking For

- We are looking for someone who:

- Speaks excellent, clear, professional English

- Is confident on the phone with U.S.-based clients

- Has outbound sales or call experience (preferred, not required)

- Follows instructions and structure precisely

- Is emotionally steady and professional under rejection

- Wants a long-term role with growth potential



This Role Is NOT a Fit If You:

- Avoid phone-based work

- Struggle to communicate clearly in English

- Dislike scripts, structure, or accountability

- Need constant supervision

- Are looking for short-term or temporary work

- Work Environment & Growth

- Fully remote

- Structured onboarding and training

- Clear expectations and feedback

- Opportunity to grow into senior sales or leadership roles

- Long-term stability for high performers



How to Apply

When applying, please answer the following questions clearly in a LOOM VIDEO:

- Are you comfortable making outbound calls daily to U.S.-based businesses? (Yes / No)

- Can you work full-time during U.S. business hours? (Yes / No)

- How would you rate your spoken English? (Basic / Good / Excellent)

- Give us a brief explanation of your relevant work experience

- What do you like to do outside of work?

Applications without complete answers may not be reviewed.



Final Note

We are building a serious company with serious standards.

If you take pride in:

Clear communication

Consistent execution

Doing things the right way

…this role could be an excellent long-term opportunity.

We look forward to reviewing applications from top-tier candidates only.

title: Sales Representative
description:
Join a fast-growing US online home goods retailer and enjoy the learning and opportunities that you have while working with us.



We strive to provide 5-star service & shopping assistance to all of our clients, and all of our team is accountable to fulfill this.



We are looking for a Sales Representative who can assist prospective buyers and close online ecommerce sales.



We're only looking for full-time, long-term, ongoing cooperation.



Work schedules available:

8 AM to 4 PM US EST

4 PM to 12 AM US EST



Your work week will be 5 days per week, with 2 days off per week. Days off will be selected with your manager. We will try to accommodate your preferences for which days you like, based on availability.



This role starts ASAP!!



Job Duties and Responsibilities:

Receive incoming phone calls and live chats from potential customers (prospects) who indicated that they need shopping assistance. This does not include calls and chats from existing customers that need help with their orders (that’s a job for a different department)

Makes follow-up calls, writes follow-up
s, and text messages to potential buyers. We try to follow up 5x with each person that contacted us (unless they indicate that they are no longer interested). We don’t do cold calling. Only reaching out to prospects who interacted with our online store and left their contact information.

After each interaction with a prospect/customer, writes notes & comments in our CRM (Asana)

Communicate efficiently and build rapport with potential customers

Assists prospects in their shopping journey and helps make the purchase decision

Ensures that all prospects’ questions and objections are addressed

Leads every interaction to a close sale, which means an order is placed on our online store

Prepares custom quotes, price matches competitors if necessary, and offers custom discounts. This requires calculating margins & ensuring profitability.

Answering questions about the products we offer, including technical questions. Learns the specifications, features and benefits of our bestsellers. Over time, becomes an expert in the industry.

If not able to answer product-specific questions, conducts research in the materials provided by the supplier, or reaches out to the supplier to get the information

Confirms stock availability and lead times when offering products to prospects

Documents standard procedures and best practices in a written form, so that other tea
mbers can learn from them



Requirements:

At least 2 years of experience in sales on the phone

Experience must include both inbound and outbound sales

Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

Experience in Customer Service on the phone is a nice to have

Experience in the e-commerce (online shopping) industry is nice to have

Home improvement, construction, and gas plumbing industry experience is a plus

Outgoing, friendly, and lively

Can-do mindset, with a sense of ownership, pride in your performance, and its impact on the company’s success

Long-term commitment - treat this as your career



What we can offer:

Sales commission: 8% of gross profit from all orders closed. Gross profit means the sale amount minus the product and shipping costs. Paid monthly. No upper limit. Monthly commission payouts range between $1,200 (the guaranteed minimum) and as high as $3,000 (for the top performer). The average monthly payout is $1,465 (average from the last 2 years).

$1,200/month minimum guaranteed pay

15 days paid days off per year (also convertible to min. guaranteed commission)

Paid training on all aspects of the role

Opportunities for professional development

Friendly atmosphere

Online Interview process

Fully remote position
